revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''PICO-PI REV: B1'' is silkscreened on the carrier board.
This device is included as part of the androidthings Pico Pro Maker kit.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX7D (MCIMX7D7DVM10SC) [[ARM]] :@800MHz Dual Core (Cortex-A7)/@200MHz (Cortex-M4) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: 4GB (eMMC) *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac (1T1R) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 5V (USB-C)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/technexion/technexion_pico-pi-imx7d |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = imx |subtarget = cortexa7 |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
